name: edgeone-pages-mcp-server_deploy_html
description: Deploy HTML content to EdgeOne Pages, return the public URL

value.description:
Provide the full HTML markup you wish to publish.
After deployment, the system will generate and return a public URL where your content can be accessed.

name: edgeone-pages-mcp-server_deploy_folder_or_zip
description: Deploy a built frontend directory (or zip file) to EdgeOne Pages. Returns: the deployment URL and project metadata.

builtFolderPath.description: Provide the absolute path to the built frontend folder(or zip file) you wish to deploy.
